biotools.summary: PROTEUS2 is a web server for comprehensive protein structure prediction and structure-based annotation. The analysis pipeline includes signal identification, trans-membrane helix prediction, trans-membrane beta-strand prediction, secondary structure prediction and homology modeling for user inputs of single or multiple sequences.
